rooms.name: Open Plan Kitchen and Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious open-plan area that seamlessly combines the kitchen and living space with natural lighting and ventilation. The layout is designed to promote social interaction while ensuring practicality in cooking, dining, and relaxation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A generously sized bedroom featuring a king-size bed, ample closet space, and an attached private balcony or terrace that adheres to Vastu principles by maintaining privacy and proper directional alignment.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: This bedroom is designed for occasional guests with comfortable seating arrangements and storage facilities. It follows local design norms ensuring a welcoming atmosphere.

rooms.name: Servant Quarters
rooms.description: A compact living area designated for the domestic help, including small kitchenette and washroom facilities. The layout is efficient and adheres to privacy guidelines.
